items.sentence: Don\'t act like you didn\'t hear the question.
Tom could swim a lot faster when he was young.
You know more about Tom than anyone else does.
Tom certainly didn\'t disappoint the audience.
I\'m not going to ask Tom what his problem is.
I\'m not sure Tom would want Mary to kiss him.
Tom\'s father isn\'t as old as Mary\'s father.
The people standing around were all strangers.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom not to do that.
I\'m the one who taught Tom how to milk a cow.
